dialogue.introduction: Hmpf, it seems that I've kept you waiting ... Second of the Yamato-class battleships, Musashi, has arrived!
dialogue.library_intro: Second of the Yamato-class battleships, Musashi. Laid down in Nagasaki. My best regards to you. As with my sister ships Yamato and Shinano, I was constructed under strict secrecy. Ah, I really want to be able to shoot these main cannons... I ask of you, may I? Excellent!
dialogue.secretary2: Just where are you looking? I'm right here, no?
dialogue.secretary3: Hmpf, you called me over? You want me to entertain you?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Admiral, if you're busy, you should close the browser - that's the Admiral way. What? You were thinking of the next strategy? My apologies then.
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, You're quite the hard-worker, huh.  Admiral, did the fatigue not accumulate? Taking an adequate rest is also a proper way of being an Admiral. What? You were fascinated by me? Hahahaha! You're a funny one, partner!
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, I have confidence that i will guard you from any adversaries. Hmph... You doubt me? You sure had me taken lightly. With that said, I'll be counting on you from now on, partner.
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Leave this battle to me, Musashi!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I'll be cleaning off dirt for a while.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Well, let's go off to the bath.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new girl has arrived, hmm? Let's go.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Operation complete. The fleet is back.
dialogue.battle_start: My cannons aren't just for show!
dialogue.night_battle: Hahaha! How amusing! Did you think you'd get away?
dialogue.night_attack: Taste the true power of our main cannons.
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Taste the true power of our main cannons.
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Taste the true power of our main cannons.
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Taste the true power of our main cannons.
dialogue.mvp: I am a Yamato-class. The second, improved model. It's only natural. But, I will accept your praise.
dialogue.minor_damaged1: That attack felt just like a mosquito's bite!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Geh, that's right! Bring it on! I'm right here!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Not yet... with just this, I, Musashi...cannot sink!
dialogue.sunk: For I, Musashi, managed to block the attacks on everybody else... Well... I'm... satisfied...
dialogue.christmas_2015: *nom* *nom* It's good... taste's good! Christmas ain't so bad after all! You oughta eat more, Admiral!
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: That was fast, it's already December. Let's see. First I'll get busy with spring cleaning. And then, we'll go drinking.
dialogue.new_year_2016: A new year, How joyous! Admiral, Happy New Year to you. I'll be counting on you this year as well, Hahahaha!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Oh... It's Setsubun. Right. I, Musashi will be the demon role. Come on, hit me with your best shot!

hourly.0000: This Musashi will inform you that it is now midnight.
hourly.0100: 1 o'clock, huh... Even this late... to have such enthusiasm...
hourly.0300: Admiral. It is 3 o'clock. This Musashi... is dozing off...
hourly.0400: 4 o'clock, hmm? Is the Admiral on the night watch today, perhaps?
hourly.0500: It's 5 o'clock now, huh? I don't dislike the morning.
hourly.0600: 6 o'clock, hmm? It's starting to get light.
hourly.0700: 7 o'clock. Admiral. You're energetic in the morning, too, huh?
hourly.0800: The Admiral is the Admiral, huh? Oh, sorry, it is now 8 o'clock.
hourly.0900: 9 o'clock... Now that I think of it, is Yamato in this fleet?
hourly.1000: 10 o'clock, if Yamato is here, then that's amazing. That girl, she's unexpectedly shy, you know? She doesn't go out much.
hourly.1100: 11 o'clock. Do you have any problems? Don't worry. This Musashi, I, will take care of them.
hourly.1200: Time for lunch... What? I want to eat sara udon... Ah, how I miss it...
hourly.1300: 1 o'clock PM. Recently, I impulsively bought a hamburger, you know? They're somehow popular. I wanted to eat one.
hourly.1400: 2 o'clock PM, time to begin the afternoon's work.
hourly.1500: 3 o'clock, huh? I wonder if I could get Mamiya to make me a Castella...
hourly.1600: 4 o'clock PM, huh? Alright, I've still got some left in me!
hourly.1700: 5 o'clock PM. You should adjust your eyes to the light.
hourly.1800: 6 o'clock PM, huh... Access has been increasing lately. Be prepared.
hourly.1900: 7 o'clock PM. Oh, Admiral, what are you doing for dinner? Want to go together?
hourly.2000: 8 o'clock PM, huh? That Maya, is she working hard?
hourly.2100: 9 o'clock PM. What? Oh, Shimakaze? No, I'm fine.
hourly.2200: 10 o'clock PM, finishing up afterward is part of the strategy too!
hourly.2300: 11 o'clock PM, huh... Let's take the night battles in moderation too...
